mapper.select: SELECT menu_id "id", parent_id "pId", name "name", (select name from com_menu m where m.menu_id = cm.PARENT_ID) "parentName" FROM com_menu cm WHERE del_flag='N' order by sort

SELECT cm.menu_id "menuId", cm.parent_id "parentId", (select name from com_menu m where m.menu_id = cm.PARENT_ID) "parentName", cm.name "name", cm.href "href", cm.remarks "remarks", cm.icon "icon", cm.target "target", cm.is_show "isShow", cm.sort "sort", cm.permission "permission" FROM com_menu cm WHERE cm.menu_id=#{menuId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT seq_com_menu.nextval as "menuId" from dual
INSERT INTO com_menu( menu_id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, sort, href, target, remarks, icon, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, permission) VALUES (trim(#{menuId}), trim(#{parentId}), trim(#{pids}), trim(#{name}), trim(#{sort}), trim(#{href}), trim(#{target}), trim(#{remarks}), trim(#{icon}), #{currentUser}, sysdate, #{currentUser}, sysdate, trim(#{permission}))
mapper.update: UPDATE com_menu SET name = trim(#{name}), href = trim(#{href}), remarks = trim(#{remarks}), target = trim(#{target}), icon = trim(#{icon}), is_show = trim(#{isShow}), update_by = #{currentUser}, update_date = sysdate, sort = trim(#{sort}), permission = trim(#{permission}) WHERE menu_id = #{menuId}
UPDATE com_menu SET del_flag='Y', update_by = #{currentUser}, update_date = sysdate WHERE menu_id = #{menuId} or parent_ids like '%' || #{menuId} || '%'
DELETE FROM com_role_menu t WHERE menu_id IN ( select menu_id from com_menu where menu_id = #{menuId} or parent_ids like '%' || #{menuId} || '%' )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO com_menu_permission( menu_permission_id, menu_id, permission_code, permission_name, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES (seq_menu_permission.nextval, #{menuId}, trim(#{permissionCode}), trim(#{permissionName}), #{currentUser}, sysdate, #{currentUser}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT menu_id "menuId", permission_code "permissionCode", permission_name "permissionName" FROM com_menu_permission WHERE menu_id=#{menuId} AND del_flag='N'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM com_menu_permission WHERE menu_id = #{menuId} AND permission_code = #{permissionCode}
